servinfo.title: All doors can not be locked / unlocked by any one of door request switch

servinfosub.title: Door Lock Function of Keyless Start System

attention3.ptxt: Before performing trouble diagnosis procedure for door lock function of keyless start system, check that power door lock system operates properly referring to Power Door Lock System Operation Inspection .

condition.ptxt: All doors can not be locked / unlocked by any one of door request switch

action.ptxt: Check request switch for operation referring to Front Door (Driver and Passenger Side), Rear End Door Request Switch Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Antennas or keyless start control module faulty

action.ptxt: Check input and output signals of keyless start control module referring to Inspection of Keyless Start Control Module and Its Circuits .
Check input and output signal of BCM referring to Inspection of BCM and Its Circuits .
